{"id":1082041025,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"1 month, 2 weeks","timestamp":1698056659,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"6 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1082041025/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Multiply Strings","memory":"6.9 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    string multiply(string a, string b) {\n        if(a==\"0\" || b==\"0\") return \"0\";\n        int m=a.length(),n=b.length();\n        bool leadingZeroes=true;\n        vector<int> result(m+n,0);\n        string ans=\"\";\n        for(int i=m-1;i>=0;i--) for(int j=n-1;j>=0;j--) {\n            result[i+j+1]+=(a[i]-'0')*(b[j]-'0');\n            result[i+j]+=result[i+j+1]/10;\n            result[i+j+1]%=10; // Saving the Carry in the next Cell\n        }\n        for(int digit:result) {\n            if(digit==0 && leadingZeroes) continue; // Eliminating the Leading Zeroes\n            else if(digit!=0 && leadingZeroes) leadingZeroes=false;\n            ans+=to_string(digit);\n        }        \n        return ans;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"multiply-strings","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
